text: Gordon Williams (born 22 February 1929, died 2002) was an English footballer. He was born in Newcastle upon Tyne, England. Williams played as a centre forward in the Football League for Sheffield United and Darlington. He made five league appearances for each club and scored once, for Darlington, on 4 November 1950 in a 3â€“2 home win against Scunthorpe United in the Third Division North. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2002 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Sheffield United F.C. players
title: Gordon Williams (footballer)
